AoU: SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person`
SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person` WHERE     year_of_birth is not null AND gender_source_concept_id is not null

SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person` p JOIN     `{CDR}.condition_occurrence` co USING (person_id) WHERE co.condition_start_date is not null     AND p.birth_datetime is not null     AND DATE_DIFF(co.condition_start_date, DATE(p.birth_datetime), YEAR) <= 21

SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person` p JOIN     `{CDR}.condition_occurrence` co USING (person_id) WHERE co.condition_start_date is not null     AND p.birth_datetime is not null     AND DATE_DIFF(co.condition_start_date, DATE(p.birth_datetime), YEAR) >= 18

SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person` p JOIN     `{CDR}.condition_occurrence` co USING (person_id) WHERE co.condition_start_date is not null     AND p.birth_datetime is not null     AND DATE_DIFF(co.condition_start_date, DATE(p.birth_datetime), YEAR) >= 65

SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person` p JOIN     `{CDR}.condition_occurrence` co USING (person_id) WHERE co.condition_start_date is not null     AND p.birth_datetime is not null     AND DATE_DIFF(co.condition_start_date, DATE(p.birth_datetime), YEAR) <= 40

SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person` p JOIN     `{CDR}.condition_occurrence` co USING (person_id) WHERE co.condition_start_date is not null     AND p.birth_datetime is not null     AND DATE_DIFF(co.condition_start_date, DATE(p.birth_datetime), YEAR) <= 65

SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person` p JOIN     `{CDR}.condition_occurrence` co USING (person_id) WHERE co.condition_start_date is not null     AND p.birth_datetime is not null     AND DATE_DIFF(co.condition_start_date, DATE(p.birth_datetime), YEAR) <= 80
SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person` p WHERE   p.race_concept_id is not null
SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person` p LEFT JOIN      `{CDR}.death` d USING (person_id) WHERE   d.death_date is not null
SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) FROM   `{CDR}.condition_occurrence` p WHERE p.condition_concept_id != 0
SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM     `{CDR}.drug_exposure` d WHERE   d.drug_concept_id != 0    AND d.drug_concept_id is not null

SELECT   p.ethnicity_concept_id,   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM   `{CDR}.person` p INNER JOIN      `{CDR}.visit_occurrence` vo USING (person_id) WHERE   vo.visit_concept_id = 9202 GROUP BY      p.ethnicity_concept_id ORDER BY p.ethnicity_concept_id
SELECT   COUNT(DISTINCT person_id) AS total_number_of_participants FROM     `{CDR}.person` p WHERE      p.state_of_residence_concept_id != 0     ANd p.state_of_residence_concept_id is not null
SELECT COUNT(distinct person_id) FROM `{CDR}.observation_period` op WHERE DATE_DIFF(observation_period_end_date, observation_period_start_date, DAY) >= 7
SELECT COUNT(distinct op.person_id) FROM `{CDR}.observation_period` op WHERE DATE_DIFF(observation_period_end_date, observation_period_start_date, DAY) > 14
SELECT COUNT(distinct op.person_id) FROM `{CDR}.observation_period` op WHERE DATE_DIFF(observation_period_end_date, observation_period_start_date, DAY) > 30
SELECT COUNT(distinct op.person_id) FROM `{CDR}.observation_period` op WHERE DATE_DIFF(observation_period_end_date, observation_period_start_date, DAY) > 6*30
SELECT COUNT(distinct op.person_id) FROM `{CDR}.observation_period` op WHERE DATE_DIFF(observation_period_end_date, observation_period_start_date, DAY) > 365
SELECT COUNT(distinct op.person_id) FROM `{CDR}.observation_period` op WHERE DATE_DIFF(observation_period_end_date, observation_period_start_date, DAY) > 2*365.25
SELECT COUNT(distinct op.person_id) FROM `{CDR}.observation_period` op WHERE DATE_DIFF(observation_period_end_date, observation_period_start_date, DAY) > 6*365.25
